Japanese: ドレイクのトロフィー

German: Fühlt sich immer noch kalt an.
Spanish: Todavía notas el frío al tocarlo.
Dutch: Nog steeds koud om aan te raken.

German: Fühlt sich immer noch kalt an.
Spanish: Todavía notas el frío al tocarlo.
Dutch: Nog steeds koud om aan te raken.

English: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Swedish: Den må vara slemmig, men skinnet är vackert mönstrat i rött och svart.
French: Bien que gluante, cette peau est ornée de superbes motifs rouges et noirs.
Italian: Seppur viscida, la pelle ha dei toni rossi e neri bellissimi.
German: Die Haut ist zwar schleimig, hat aber ein wundervolles rotes und schwarzes Muster.
Spanish: A pesar de ser viscosa, la piel tiene unos tonos rojos y negros preciosos.
Russian: Противная, зато на коже есть красивый красно-черный узор.
Romanian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Bulgarian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Macedonian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Finnish: Vaikkakin limainen, sen iho on verhoiltu kauniilla punaisilla ja mustilla kuvioilla.
Danish: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Icelandic: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Turkish: Deri yapış yapış olsa da göz alıcı kırmızı siyah desenlere sahip.
Lithuanian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Czech: Ačkoli je slizká, pokožka je krásně vzorovaná v červené a černé barvě.
Hungarian: Ugyan nyálkás, a bőrt szép, piros-fekete mintázat borítja.
Slovak: Aj keď je slizká, pokožku zdobí krásny červeno-čierny vzor.
Polish: Lepka skóra ozdobiona jest przepięknym czerwono-czarnym wzorem.
Dutch: Slijmerig, ja, maar achterop de huid staat een mooi rood-zwart patroon.
Portuguese: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A pele pegajosa ostenta um belo padrão em vermelho e preto.
Chinese: 虽然有点黏糊糊的，不过它的皮肤上却有黑红相间的精美图案。
Japanese: ネバネバしているが、皮膚には赤と黒の美しい模様がある。
Korean: 슬라임 같지만, 피부는 붉은색과 검은색의 무늬가 아름답게 그려져 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 雖然有點黏糊糊的，不過它的皮膚上卻有黑紅相間的精美圖案。

Italian: Seppur viscida, la pelle ha dei toni rossi e neri bellissimi.
German: Die Haut ist zwar schleimig, hat aber ein wundervolles rotes und schwarzes Muster.
Spanish: A pesar de ser viscosa, la piel tiene unos tonos rojos y negros preciosos.
Russian: Противная, зато на коже есть красивый красно-черный узор.
Romanian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Bulgarian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Macedonian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Finnish: Vaikkakin limainen, sen iho on verhoiltu kauniilla punaisilla ja mustilla kuvioilla.
Danish: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Icelandic: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Turkish: Deri yapış yapış olsa da göz alıcı kırmızı siyah desenlere sahip.
Lithuanian: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Czech: Ačkoli je slizká, pokožka je krásně vzorovaná v červené a černé barvě.
Hungarian: Ugyan nyálkás, a bőrt szép, piros-fekete mintázat borítja.
Slovak: Aj keď je slizká, pokožku zdobí krásny červeno-čierny vzor.
Polish: Lepka skóra ozdobiona jest przepięknym czerwono-czarnym wzorem.
Dutch: Slijmerig, ja, maar achterop de huid staat een mooi rood-zwart patroon.
Portuguese: Although slimy, the skin is beautifully patterned in red and black.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A pele pegajosa ostenta um belo padrão em vermelho e preto.
Chinese: 虽然有点黏糊糊的，不过它的皮肤上却有黑红相间的精美图案。
Japanese: ネバネバしているが、皮膚には赤と黒の美しい模様がある。
Korean: 슬라임 같지만, 피부는 붉은색과 검은색의 무늬가 아름답게 그려져 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 雖然有點黏糊糊的，不過它的皮膚上卻有黑紅相間的精美圖案。

Japanese: ロックスのトロフィー

English: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Swedish: Huvudet från en jättebest, mattat med tjock päls.
French: Une tête de bête géante, couverte d'une épaisse fourrure.
Italian: La testa di una bestia gigante, ricoperta di un pelo spesso.
German: Der Kopf einer gigantischen Bestie, die mit dichtem Fell bedeckt ist.
Spanish: La cabeza gigante cubierta de pelo de una bestia.
Russian: Голова гигантского зверя, покрытая густым мехом.
Romanian: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Bulgarian: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Macedonian: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Finnish: Paksulla turkilla peitetty jättiläismäisen pedon pää.
Danish: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Icelandic: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Turkish: Dev bir yaratığın kalın kürkle kaplı başı.
Lithuanian: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Czech: Hlava obřího zvířete pokrytá silnou srstí.
Hungarian: Egy hatalmas fenevad feje, amelyet vastag szőr fed.
Slovak: Hlava obrovského zvieraťa pokrytá hrubou srsťou.
Polish: Głowa gigantycznej bestii, pokryta grubą sierścią.
Dutch: De kop van een gigantisch beest, bedekt met een dikke vacht.
Portuguese: A giant beast's head, thatched with thick fur.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A cabeça de uma fera gigantesca, coberta de uma pelagem grossa.
Chinese: 一颗巨兽的头颅，被厚厚的毛皮覆盖着。
Japanese: 厚い毛皮に縁取られた、大きな獣の頭。
Korean: 두꺼운 모피로 엮은 거대한 야수의 머리.
Chinese_Traditional: 一顆巨獸的頭顱，被厚厚的毛皮覆蓋著。

English: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Swedish: De små ögonen och sylvassa tänderna vederlägger den lilla ödlans skenbart lugna natur.
French: Ses yeux globuleux et ses dents acérées contrastent avec la nature excessivement calme de ce petit lézard.
Italian: I suoi occhi luccicanti e denti affilatissimi smentono la natura apparentemente calma di questa piccola lucertola.
German: Die perlenartigen Augen und scharfen Klauen täuschen über die angeblich so friedvolle Natur dieser kleinen Nixe hinweg.
Spanish: Esos ojos diminutos y esos dientes afilados contradicen la naturaleza tranquila de este pequeño lagarto.
Russian: Блестящие глаза и острые как бритва зубы противоречат якобы спокойному характеру этой маленькой ящерицы.
Romanian: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Bulgarian: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Macedonian: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Finnish: Sen helmimäiset silmät ja partaveitsenterävät hampaat antavat väärän käsityksen tämän pienen liskon näennäisesti rauhallisesta olemuksesta.
Danish: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Icelandic: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Turkish: Parlak gözler ve ustura keskinliğindeki dişler, bu küçük kertenkelenin sakin görünen tabiatıyla zıt düşüyor.
Lithuanian: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Czech: Korálkovité oči a ostré zuby popírají zdánlivě klidnou povahu této malé ještěrky.
Hungarian: A gombszemek és a pengeéles fogak meghazudtolják a kisméretű gyík látszólag nyugodt természetét.
Slovak: Korálkové očká a zuby ostré ako britva sú v rozpore so zdanlivo pokojnou povahou tejto malej jašterice.
Polish: Paciorkowate oczy i ostre jak brzytwa zęby stanowią zaprzeczenie pozornie spokojnej natury tej małej jaszczurki.
Dutch: De kraaloogjes en messenscherpe tanden zijn geen goede uitdrukking van de doorgaans kalme natuur van deze kleine hagedis.
Portuguese: The beady eyes and razorsharp teeth belies the ostensibly calm nature of this small lizard.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Os olhos arredondados e os dentes afiados traem a natureza aparentemente calma deste pequeno lagarto.
Chinese: 泛着珠光的眼睛和锋利的牙齿掩盖了这种小蜥蜴表面上平静的特质。
Japanese: 小さな目と鋭い歯は、この小さなトカゲの表面的にはおとなしい性質を暴き出している。
Korean: 이 작은 파충류의 온순한 성정은 구슬처럼 빛나는 눈동자와 면도날처럼 날카로운 이빨에 가려져 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 泛著珠光的眼睛和鋒利的牙齒掩蓋了這種小蜥蜴表面上平静的特質。

English: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Swedish: Fjällen har mattnat något, men ögonen skiner än.
French: Ses écailles se sont ternies, mais ses yeux sont toujours brillants.
Italian: Le squame si sono spente ma gli occhi brillano ancora.
German: Auch wenn die Schuppen matter aussehen, sind die Augen noch immer von einem Leuchten erfüllt.
Spanish: Las escamas han perdido su lustre, pero los ojos aún brillan.
Russian: Чешуя потускнела, но его глаза по-прежнему блестят.
Romanian: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Bulgarian: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Macedonian: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Finnish: Sen suomut ovat tylsistyneet mutta sen silmät ovat vieläkin kirkkaat.
Danish: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Icelandic: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Turkish: Pullar parıltısını yitirse de gözler hâlâ ışıl ışıl.
Lithuanian: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Czech: Šupiny zmatnili ale oči jsou stále jasné.
Hungarian: A pikkelyek eltompultak, de a szemek még mindig ragyognak.
Slovak: Šupiny vybledli ale oči sú stále jasné.
Polish: Łuski wyblakły, lecz oczy nadal błyszczą.
Dutch: De schubben zijn wat vaal geworden, maar de ogen glinsteren nog.
Portuguese: The scales have dulled but the eyes are still bright.
Portuguese_Brazilian: As escamas ficaram opacas, mas os olhos seguem brilhantes.
Chinese: 鳞片已有些许钝，但眼睛却依旧闪烁。
Japanese: 鱗はくすんでいるが、目はまだ輝いている。
Korean: 비늘은 무뎌졌지만 두 눈은 아직 반짝입니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 鱗片已經失去光澤，但眼睛卻依舊閃爍。

Japanese: ストーンゴーレムのトロフィー

English: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Swedish: Den kristallartade stenformationen skulle utgöra en imponerande golvprydnad.
French: Cette formation de roche cristallisée ferait une décoration impressionnante.
Italian: Questa formazione di rocce cristallizzate sarebbe una decorazione da pavimento impressionante.
German: Diese kristalline Felsformation gäbe sicher eine beeindruckende Bodendekoration ab.
Spanish: Esta formación de roca cristalina quedaría impresionante de decoración.
Russian: Это кристаллическое каменное образование станет прекрасным напольным украшением.
Romanian: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Bulgarian: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Macedonian: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Finnish: Tästä kristallinkaltaisesta kivimuodostumasta saisi vaikuttavan lattiakoristeen.
Danish: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Icelandic: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Turkish: Bu kristalize kaya oluşumundan harika bir zemin dekorasyonu olur.
Lithuanian: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Czech: Tento krystalický skalní útvar by byl působivou výzdobou podlahy.
Hungarian: Ez a kristályos kőképződmény lenyűgöző padlódíszt alkotna.
Slovak: Toto kryštálové kamenné zoskupenie by na tvojej podlahe nevyzeralo zle.\n
Polish: Ta krystaliczna formacja skalna stanowiłaby imponującą dekorację podłogi.
Dutch: Deze kristallen rotsformatie zou niet misstaan op je vloer.
Portuguese: This crystalline rock formation would make for an impressive floor decoration.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Esta formação rochosa cristalina daria uma impressionante decoração para o piso.
Chinese: 这种结晶岩层可以成为令人惊叹的地板装饰。
Japanese: この結晶化した石の構造は、すばらしい床の装飾になりそうだ。
Korean: 이 결정암의 암반층은 인상적인 바닥 장식이 될 것같습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 這種結晶岩層可以成為令人驚嘆的地板裝飾。

English: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Swedish: Det uttryckslösa leendet på skallen påminner dig om dödens oundvikliga natur.
French: Le rictus inexpressif de ce crâne vous rappelle le caractère inéluctable de la mort.
Italian: Il sorriso inespressivo di questo teschio ti ricorda l'inevitabilità della morte.
German: Das ausdruckslose Grinsen dieses Schädels erinnert dich an die Unausweichlichkeit des Todes.
Spanish: La sonrisa inexpresiva de esta calavera te recuerda a la inexorabilidad de la muerte.
Russian: Бездушный оскал этого черепа напоминает о неизбежности смерти.
Romanian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Bulgarian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Macedonian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Finnish: Tämän pääkallon ilmeetön virnistys muistuttaa sinua vääjäämättömästä kuolemasta.
Danish: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Icelandic: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Turkish: Bu kurukafanın ifadesiz sırıtışı sana ölümün kaçınılmazlığını hatırlatıyor.
Lithuanian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Czech: Bezvýrazný úsměv této lebky vám připomíná nevyhnutelnost smrti.
Hungarian: A koponya kifejezéstelen vigyora a halál elkerülhetetlenségére emlékeztet.
Slovak: Ničnehovoriacy výraz tejto lebky vám pripomína nevyhnutnosť smrti.
Polish: Martwy uśmiech tej czaszki przypomina o nieuchronności śmierci.
Dutch: De uitdrukkingsloze grijns van de schedel doet je denken aan de onontkoombaarheid van de dood.
Portuguese: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Portuguese_Brazilian: O sorriso inexpressivo deste crânio é um lembrete da inevitabilidade da morte.
Chinese: 毫无表情的骷髅头提醒着你死亡的必然性。
Japanese: この頭蓋骨の無表情な笑顔は、死を避けられないことを思い出させてくれる。
Korean: 이 해골의 감정 없는 미소는 죽음의 필연성을 상기시켜줍니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 毫無表情的骷髏頭提醒著你死亡的必然性。

Swedish: Det uttryckslösa leendet på skallen påminner dig om dödens oundvikliga natur.
French: Le rictus inexpressif de ce crâne vous rappelle le caractère inéluctable de la mort.
Italian: Il sorriso inespressivo di questo teschio ti ricorda l'inevitabilità della morte.
German: Das ausdruckslose Grinsen dieses Schädels erinnert dich an die Unausweichlichkeit des Todes.
Spanish: La sonrisa inexpresiva de esta calavera te recuerda a la inexorabilidad de la muerte.
Russian: Бездушный оскал этого черепа напоминает о неизбежности смерти.
Romanian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Bulgarian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Macedonian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Finnish: Tämän pääkallon ilmeetön virnistys muistuttaa sinua vääjäämättömästä kuolemasta.
Danish: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Icelandic: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Turkish: Bu kurukafanın ifadesiz sırıtışı sana ölümün kaçınılmazlığını hatırlatıyor.
Lithuanian: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Czech: Bezvýrazný úsměv této lebky vám připomíná nevyhnutelnost smrti.
Hungarian: A koponya kifejezéstelen vigyora a halál elkerülhetetlenségére emlékeztet.
Slovak: Ničnehovoriacy výraz tejto lebky vám pripomína nevyhnutnosť smrti.
Polish: Martwy uśmiech tej czaszki przypomina o nieuchronności śmierci.
Dutch: De uitdrukkingsloze grijns van de schedel doet je denken aan de onontkoombaarheid van de dood.
Portuguese: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.
Portuguese_Brazilian: O sorriso inexpressivo deste crânio é um lembrete da inevitabilidade da morte.
Chinese: 毫无表情的骷髅头提醒着你死亡的必然性。
Japanese: この頭蓋骨の無表情な笑顔は、死を避けられないことを思い出させてくれる。
Korean: 이 해골의 감정 없는 미소는 죽음의 필연성을 상기시켜줍니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 毫無表情的骷髏頭提醒著你死亡的必然性。

Japanese: 腐敗した残骸のトロフィー

English: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Swedish: En stinkande, rutten skalle. Du undrar varför du behöll den...
French: Un crâne pourri. Vous ne savez pas trop pourquoi vous l'avez gardé...
Italian: Un teschio rancido e putrefatto. Non sei sicuro perché l'hai tenuto...
German: Ein ranziger, verrotteter Schädel. Du bist dir nicht sicher, warum du ihn aufgehoben hast...
Spanish: Una calavera fétida y putrefacta. No sabes por qué te la has quedado…
Russian: Вонючий гнилой череп. Вы не знаете, почему его сохранили...
Romanian: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Bulgarian: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Macedonian: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Finnish: Löyhkäävä ja mädäntynyt pääkallo. Et ole yhtään varma miksi säilytit sen...
Danish: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Icelandic: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Turkish: Kokuşmuş ve çürümüş bir kurukafa. Niye hâlâ sakladığını bilmiyorsun...
Lithuanian: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Czech: Zatuchlá a shnilá lebka. Nejsi si jist, proč sis to nechal...
Hungarian: Egy bűzös és elrothadt koponya. Fogalmad sincs, minek őrizted meg...
Slovak: Špinavá, prehnitá lebka. Nie si si vôbec istí, prečo si to vlastne nechávaš...
Polish: Śmierdząca przegniła czaszka. Właściwie to nie wiesz, dlaczego wciąż ją masz...
Dutch: Een smerige, verrotte schedel. Je weet niet zeker waarom je die hebt gehouden…
Portuguese: A rank and rotten skull. You're not sure why you kept it...
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um crânio rançoso e podre. Você não entende bem por que quis ficar com ele…
Chinese: 一颗颓丧腐烂的头骨，你并不知道你为什么还留着它...
Japanese: 悪臭を放つ腐った頭蓋骨。 なぜこんなものを大事に持っているんだろう...
Korean: 악취나는 부패한 해골. 왜 아직까지 가지고 있는지 모르겠습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 一顆頹喪腐爛的頭骨，你並不知道你為什麼還留著它...

Japanese: スルトリングのトロフィー

English: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Swedish: Omgiven av en blek flamma pyr den fortfarande som ett glödande kol.
French: Couronné de flammes pâles, il continue de brûler comme une braise.
Italian: Avvolto in una fiamma pallida, continua a bruciare come un tizzone ardente.
German: Umspielt von einer bleichen Flamme glimmt es noch immer wie ein Stück Glut.
Spanish: Aún arde como una brasa, envuelto en una llama pálida.
Russian: Охваченный белым пламенем, суртлинг тлеет, словно уголек.
Romanian: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Bulgarian: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Macedonian: Слаб е огнот, но уште има жар.
Finnish: Kalpean tulen syleilemänä, se kytee vieläkin hiilloksen lailla.
Danish: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Icelandic: Í ljósum logum, það snarkar eins og góður viður.
Turkish: Solgun alevlerin çelenk gibi sardığı bu av ganimeti, bir köz gibi hâlâ için için yanıyor.
Lithuanian: Wreathed in pale flame, it still smolders like an ember.
Czech: Zahalený bledým plamenem stále doutná jako žhavé uhlíky. \n
Hungarian: Halovány láng öleli körbe, de még mindig parázsként izzik.
Slovak: Zahalený bledým plameňom stále tlie ako uhlík.
Polish: Otoczony bladym płomieniem, wciąż tli się niczym rozżarzony węgielek.
Dutch: Omgeven door een vale vlam die nog steeds smeult.
Portuguese: Envolto em chama pálida, ainda fumega como uma brasa.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Envolto em chamas pálidas, ele ainda arde como brasa.
Chinese: 环绕在淡淡的火焰之中，像未尽的余火还在阴燃。
Japanese: 淡い炎に包まれ、今でも燠のように燻っている。
Korean: 창백한 불길에 감싸여 여전히 잿불처럼 연기가 피어오릅니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 暗淡的火焰，就像餘燄未盡的木炭。

Swedish: Omgiven av en blek flamma pyr den fortfarande som ett glödande kol.

Hungarian: Halovány láng öleli körbe, de még mindig parázsként izzik.
Slovak: Zahalený bledým plameňom stále tlie ako uhlík.
Polish: Otoczony bladym płomieniem, wciąż tli się niczym rozżarzony węgielek.
Dutch: Omgeven door een vale vlam die nog steeds smeult.
Portuguese: Envolto em chama pálida, ainda fumega como uma brasa.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Envolto em chamas pálidas, ele ainda arde como brasa.
Chinese: 环绕在淡淡的火焰之中，像未尽的余火还在阴燃。
Japanese: 淡い炎に包まれ、今でも燠のように燻っている。
Korean: 창백한 불길에 감싸여 여전히 잿불처럼 연기가 피어오릅니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 暗淡的火焰，就像餘燄未盡的木炭。

English: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Swedish: Den läderaktiga huden bär spår av uråldriga symboler.
French: D’anciens symboles ternis par le temps ornent cette peau coriace.
Italian: La pelle coriacea porta le tracce sbiadite di simboli antichi.
German: Die ledrige Haut trägt die Überreste uralter Symbole.
Spanish: La piel de cuero cuenta con una tracería apenas visible de símbolos ancestrales.
Russian: На грубой коже едва различимы какие-то древние символы.
Romanian: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Bulgarian: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Macedonian: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Finnish: Sen nahkainen iho kantaa muinaisia, häivyttyneitä jälkiä vanhoista symbooleista.
Danish: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Icelandic: Leður húðin hefur dofnuð ummerki um forn merki.
Turkish: Trolün kösele gibi derisi, kadim sembollerin solmuş izlerini taşıyor.
Lithuanian: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.
Czech: Drsná kůže nese vybledlou kružbu starověkých symbolů.
Hungarian: A bőr ősi szimbólumok megfakult körvonalát viseli magán.
Slovak: Zhrubnutá pokožka vykazuje stopy kružby so starodávnymi symbolmi.\n
Polish: Szorstka skóra nosi ślady maswerków ze starożytnymi symbolami.
Dutch: De leerachtige huid bevat vervaagde sporen van oeroude symbolen.
Portuguese: A pele semelhante a couro com sinais desvanecidos de símbolos antigos.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A pele curtida exibe traços de símbolos antigos esmaecidos.
Chinese: 皮革般的皮肤上隐约可现古老印记的痕迹。
Japanese: 革のような肌には古代の紋章の消えかけた痕跡が並んでいる。
Korean: 가죽 같은 피부에는 흐릿해진 고대의 기호가 남아 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 粗糙的皮膚上帶有褪色的古老符號花紋。

Chinese: 皮革般的皮肤上隐约可现古老印记的痕迹。
Japanese: 革のような肌には古代の紋章の消えかけた痕跡が並んでいる。
Korean: 가죽 같은 피부에는 흐릿해진 고대의 기호가 남아 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 粗糙的皮膚上帶有褪色的古老符號花紋。

English: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Swedish: Frusen i döden, håret mättat med blod och ett tyst ylande fast i dess hals.
French: Gelé dans la mort, la fourrure teintée de sang et un hurlement silencieux logé dans sa gorge.
Italian: Congelata nella morte, la pelliccia macchiata di sangue ed un ululato silenzioso adagiato nella sua gola.
German: Im Moment des Todes erstarrt, das Fell getränkt in Blut und mit einem letzten Heulen im Halse, dass nie erklang.
Spanish: Murió congelado, con el pelaje cubierto en sangre y un aullido atrapado en la garganta.
Russian: Окоченевший от мороза, с запутанной, покрытой кровью шерстью, он будто вот-вот завоет.
Romanian: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Bulgarian: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Macedonian: Замрзнато во смрт, крзното со крв.
Finnish: Verestä takkuuntunut turkki ja kurkkuun kiinni jäänyt hiljainen ulvonta, kuoleman kangistama.
Danish: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Icelandic: Frosin í dauða, hárið út atað blóði og hljóðlátt ýlfr fast í hálsinum
Turkish: Ölümün katılığı üzerine çökmüş olsa da postu kanla matlaşmış ve boğazına sessiz bir uluma takılıp kalmış.
Lithuanian: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Czech: Zamrznutý smrtí, srst slepena krví a tiché vytí uvízlé v hrdle.
Hungarian: Halálra fagyott. A szőr összecsomósodott a vértől, és egy néma üvöltés a torkán akadt.
Slovak: Zamrznutý smrťou, srsť zmatnená krvou a tiché vytie uviaznuté hlboko v jeho hrdle.
Polish: To zwierzę o sierści zlepionej krwią zamarzło na śmierć, wyglądając tak, jakby wciąż chciało cicho zawyć.
Dutch: Bevroren in de dood, haar bedekt met bloed, en een stille grom achterin de keel.
Portuguese: Congelado na morte, o cabelo cheio de sangue seco e um uivo silencioso preso na garganta.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Congelado na morte, o pelo manchado de sangue seco e um uivo silencioso preso na garganta.
Chinese: 冰封在死亡之中，头发沾着血迹，喉咙仿佛还在无声地嚎叫。
Japanese: 死に凍りつき、毛皮は血まみれで、音のない吠え声がのどにつかえている。
Korean: 얼어붙은 채 죽어 있지만, 털은 여전히 피로 얼룩져 있고 조용한 울음이 목에 박혀 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 冰封在死亡之中，毛髮沾著血跡，喉嚨彷彿還在無聲地嚎叫。

Italian: Congelata nella morte, la pelliccia macchiata di sangue ed un ululato silenzioso adagiato nella sua gola.
German: Im Moment des Todes erstarrt, das Fell getränkt in Blut und mit einem letzten Heulen im Halse, dass nie erklang.

Russian: Окоченевший от мороза, с запутанной, покрытой кровью шерстью, он будто вот-вот завоет.

Bulgarian: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.
Macedonian: Замрзнато во смрт, крзното со крв.
Finnish: Verestä takkuuntunut turkki ja kurkkuun kiinni jäänyt hiljainen ulvonta, kuoleman kangistama.

Turkish: Ölümün katılığı üzerine çökmüş olsa da postu kanla matlaşmış ve boğazına sessiz bir uluma takılıp kalmış.
Lithuanian: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.

Hungarian: Halálra fagyott. A szőr összecsomósodott a vértől, és egy néma üvöltés a torkán akadt.
Slovak: Zamrznutý smrťou, srsť zmatnená krvou a tiché vytie uviaznuté hlboko v jeho hrdle.
Polish: To zwierzę o sierści zlepionej krwią zamarzło na śmierć, wyglądając tak, jakby wciąż chciało cicho zawyć.
Dutch: Bevroren in de dood, haar bedekt met bloed, en een stille grom achterin de keel.
Portuguese: Congelado na morte, o cabelo cheio de sangue seco e um uivo silencioso preso na garganta.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Congelado na morte, o pelo manchado de sangue seco e um uivo silencioso preso na garganta.
Chinese: 冰封在死亡之中，头发沾着血迹，喉咙仿佛还在无声地嚎叫。
Japanese: 死に凍りつき、毛皮は血まみれで、音のない吠え声がのどにつかえている。
Korean: 얼어붙은 채 죽어 있지만, 털은 여전히 피로 얼룩져 있고 조용한 울음이 목에 박혀 있습니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 冰封在死亡之中，毛髮沾著血跡，喉嚨彷彿還在無聲地嚎叫。

English: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Swedish: En vålnads ömsade skinn; en svepande rock synlig enbart i månljus.
French: La peau d’un spectre, une robe uniquement visible au clair de lune.
Italian: La pelle strappata di un wraith, una veste fluente visibile solo al chiaro di luna.
German: Die Haut eines Zorngeists, nur sichtbar im Licht des Mondes.
Spanish: La piel que ha mudado un espectro; una túnica ondulante que solo se ve a la luz de la luna.
Russian: Прозрачная кожа призрака - струящаяся материя, которую можно разглядеть лишь в свете луны.
Romanian: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Bulgarian: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Macedonian: Парче кожа на смртта, лета, но е видлива само под месечина.
Finnish: Voit erottaa vain hiljaa soljuvan kaavun kuunvalossa, viimein matkaa jatkaneen hengen jälkeenjättämä.
Danish: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Icelandic: Flakað skinn af gangára, flæðandi skykkja sem sést einungis í tunglskini.
Turkish: Bir heyulanın dökülmüş derisi, yalnızca ay ışığında görülebilen uçuşan bir cübbe.
Lithuanian: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.
Czech: Shozená kůže přízraku, splývavé roucho viditelné pouze za měsíčního světla.
Hungarian: Egy kísértet levedlett bőre; egy lebegő köpeny, mely csak holdfényben látszik.
Slovak: Koža prízraku, padavé rúcho viditeľné iba pri mesačnom svite.
Polish: Skóra zrzucona przez zjawę. Ta powiewająca szata widoczna jest tylko w świetle księżyca.
Dutch: De afgeworpen huid van een schim, een gewaad dat alleen in het maanlicht zichtbaar is.
Portuguese: A pele abandonada de um espectro, um manto ondulante que é visível apenas ao luar.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A pele abandonada de um espectro, um manto ondulante que é visível apenas ao luar.
Chinese: 鬼魅掉下的皮，隐隐流动的斗篷，只有借助月光才能看见。
Japanese: 死霊から剥ぎ取られた皮、月光の下でだけ見える、たなびくローブ。
Korean: 망령의 흘러내리는 듯한 피부는 달빛 아래에서만 나풀거리는 예복처럼 보입니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 鬼魅掉下的皮，隱隱流動的斗篷，只有借助月光才能看見。

English: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.

German: Die Haut eines Zorngeists, nur sichtbar im Licht des Mondes.

Bulgarian: The shed skin of a wraith, a flowing robe only visible by moonlight.

Portuguese: A pele abandonada de um espectro, um manto ondulante que é visível apenas ao luar.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A pele abandonada de um espectro, um manto ondulante que é visível apenas ao luar.
Chinese: 鬼魅掉下的皮，隐隐流动的斗篷，只有借助月光才能看见。
Japanese: 死霊から剥ぎ取られた皮、月光の下でだけ見える、たなびくローブ。

Chinese_Traditional: 鬼魅掉下的皮，隱隱流動的斗篷，只有借助月光才能看見。

English: These can be planted in cultivated soil.
French: Peuvent être plantées dans un sol cultivé.
Italian: Queste possono essere piantate in un terreno arato
German: Kann in umgegrabener Erde gepflanzt werden.
Spanish: Se pueden plantar en la tierra cultivada.
Romanian: These can be planted in cultivated soil.
Bulgarian: These can be planted in cultivated soil.
Macedonian: These can be planted in cultivated soil.
Danish: These can be planted in cultivated soil.

Portuguese_Brazilian: Podem ser plantadas em solo cultivado.
Japanese: 耕作土壌に植えられる。
栄養たっぷりで回復できる。

English: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Swedish: Det uråldriga benet minns platserna för många fördolda ting.
French: Cet os ancien se souvient de l'emplacement de nombreuses choses oubliées.
Italian: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
German: Dieser uralte Knochen erinnert sich an den Aufenthaltsort vieler längst vergessener Dinge.
Spanish: Este hueso milenario recuerda la ubicación de cientos de cosas olvidadas.
Russian: Эта древняя кость помнит расположение многих забытых вещей.
Romanian: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Bulgarian: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Macedonian: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Finnish: Tämä ikivanha luu muistaa monen unohtuneen asian paikan.
Danish: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Icelandic: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Turkish: Bu antik kemik, unutulan pek çok şeyin yerini hatırlıyor.
Lithuanian: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Czech: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Hungarian: Ez az ősi csont számos elfeledett dolog helyére emlékszik.
Slovak: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Polish: Ta starożytna kość pamięta położenie wielu zapomnianych rzeczy.
Dutch: Dit oude bot kent de locatie van vele vergeten dingen.
Portuguese: This ancient bone remembers the location of many forgotten things.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Este osso antigo se lembra do local de inúmeras coisas que outros já esqueceram.
Chinese: 这块古老的骨头能定位很多被遗忘的宝物。
Japanese: この古い骨は、たくさんの忘れられたもののありかを覚えている。
Korean: 이 고대 뼈는 많은 잊혀진 물건들의 위치를 기억합니다.
Chinese_Traditional: 這塊古老的骨頭能定位很多被遺忘的寶物。

English: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Swedish: Ett stort ben, knotigt som gammalt trä.
French: Un os géant, noué comme du vieux bois.
Italian: Un osso gigante, annodato come un vecchio legno.
Spanish: Hueso gigante, nudoso como la madera vieja.
Russian: Огромная кость, похожая на кусок старой древесины.
Romanian: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Bulgarian: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Macedonian: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Finnish: Jättiläismäinen luu, solmittu kuin vanha puu.
Danish: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Icelandic: Risavaxið bein, hnúað eins og gamall viður.
Turkish: Yıllanmış odun misali iç içe geçen dev bir kemik.
Lithuanian: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Czech: Obří kost, svázaná jako staré dřevo.
Hungarian: Egy hatalmas csont, mely csomós, akár a régi fák.
Slovak: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.
Polish: Gigantyczna kość, powykręcana jak stare drewno.
Dutch: Een gigantisch bot, knokig als oud hout.
Portuguese: Um osso gigante, com nós semelhantes aos da madeira velha.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um osso gigante, ressecado como madeira velha.
Chinese: 巨大的骨头，有着陈年旧木般的结节。
Japanese: 古木のように節くれだった、巨大な骨。
Chinese_Traditional: 巨大的骨頭，有著陳年舊木般的結節。

English: Good strong wood to build with.

Macedonian: Good strong wood to build with.

Turkish: İnşaatta kullanılabilecek iyi ve güçlü bir ahşap.
Lithuanian: Good strong wood to build with.
Slovak: Good strong wood to build with.
Dutch: Goed, sterk hout om mee te bouwen.

English: The earthy remains of the giant Ymir.
