Just pick things up and it will all come back to you, I'm sure.\n\nMy lesser brother, Munin, tells me one can fashion a Stone Axe out of <color=yellow>Wood and Stone</color>.
Danish: Most items must be crafted. However, due to your recent departure from Midgard, you will have to recall the true shape of objects. Just pick things up and it will all come back to you, I'm sure.\n\nMy lesser brother, Munin, tells me one can fashion a Stone Axe out of <color=yellow>Wood and Stone</color>.
Icelandic:
Þetta er eignarskráin þín og verkstöð. Nýjar uppskriftir munu birtast þegar þú safnar hlutum í hana.

Prufaðu að smíða kylfu úr við eða öxi úr stein og við.

Ábending: Hægt er að finna tinnustein nálægt vatni
Turkish: Çoğu eşya önce üretilmelidir fakat yakın zamanda Midgard'dan göçtüğün için, nesnelerin gerçek şeklini hatırlaman gerekiyor. Eminim nesneleri aldığında her şey eski hâline dönecektir.\n\nKüçük kardeşim Munin'in dediğine göre <color=yellow>Ahşap ve Taş</color> kullanarak Taş Balta üretilebiliyormuş.
Lithuanian: Most items must be crafted. However, due to your recent departure from Midgard, you will have to recall the true shape of objects. Just pick things up and it will all come back to you, I'm sure.\n\nMy lesser brother, Munin, tells me one can fashion a Stone Axe out of <color=yellow>Wood and Stone</color>.
Czech: Většina předmětů musí být vyrobena. Každopádně, díky tvému nedávnému odchodu z Midgardu si budeš muset vybavit tvar objektů. Jednoduše věci seber a vše se ti bude vybavovat, jsem si tím jist.\n\nMůj druhořadý bratr, Munin, mi říká že jeden může vyrobit Kamennou Sekeru ze <color=yellow>Dřeva a Kamene</color>.
Hungarian:
Ez a leltár és barkácsolási képernyő. Az új receptek akkor válnak elérhetővé, amikor az összes szükséges alapanyaggal rendelkezel hozzájuk.
 
 Próbálj meg készíteni egy bunkósbotot némi fából, vagy egy kőbaltát fából és kőből!
 
 Tipp: kovakövet a víz mellett találod.
Slovak: Most items must be crafted. However, due to your recent departure from Midgard, you will have to recall the true shape of objects. Just pick things up and it will all come back to you, I'm sure.\n\nMy lesser brother, Munin, tells me one can fashion a Stone Axe out of <color=yellow>Wood and Stone</color>.
Polish:
To jest okno ekwipunku i tworzenia. Nowe przepisy będą odblokowane po zdobyciu odpowiednich przedmiotów do ich wytworzenia.

Spróbuj wytworzyć maczugę z drewna lub topór z drewna i kamienia.

Porada: krzemień można znaleźć w pobliżu wody.
Dutch: De meeste items zul je zelf moeten maken. Vanwege je recente vertrek uit Midgard zul je echter de herinnering aan de ware vorm van objecten moeten terughalen. Pak dingen op, dan komt het wel weer bij je bovendrijven.\n\nMijn mindere broer Munin heeft me verteld dat je een stenen bijl kunt maken met <color=yellow>hout en steen</color>.
Portuguese: Most items must be crafted. However, due to your recent departure from Midgard, you will have to recall the true shape of objects. Just pick things up and it will all come back to you, I'm sure.\n\nMy lesser brother, Munin, tells me one can fashion a Stone Axe out of <color=yellow>Wood and Stone</color>.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A maioria dos itens precisa ser fabricada. No entanto, devido à sua partida recente de Midgard, você terá que relembrar a verdadeira forma dos objetos. Basta pegar as coisas e tenho certeza de que logo sua memória voltará.\n\nMeu irmão menor, Munin, disse que você pode usar <color=yellow>madeira e pedra</color> para criar um machado de pedra.
Chinese: 大部分的物品都需要手工制作才能获得。 但结合你刚刚离开人界的事实，你将会面临必须要回忆起世间各种物品的真实形态。 不过只要你一直坚持拾取各种物品，你对世间万物的记忆便会慢慢回来。 \n\n我弟弟雾尼曾经跟我说过，人们可以用<color=yellow>木材和石头</color>.做成一把石斧。
Japanese: ほとんどの物は、作らなければ手に入らない。 しかしあなたはミズガルズから旅立ったばかり。 物の本当の形を思い出さなければならない。 何かを手に取れば、すぐに思い出すはずだ。 \n\n弟のムニンの話では、<color=yellow>木と石</color>から石の斧を作れるということだ。
Korean: 대부분의 아이템들은 직접 제작해야 하네. 하지만 그대는 최근에 미드가르드를 떠났기 때문에 사물의 진실된 모습들을 다시 기억해 내야만 해. 이것저것 줍다 보면 분명히 기억들이 돌아올 것이다. \n\n나의 형제, 무닌이 말하길, <color=yellow>나무와 돌</color>로 돌도끼란 걸 만들 수 있다더군.
Chinese_Traditional: 大部分的物品都需要手工製作才能獲得。 但你才剛離開人界，你需要回憶起各種物品的真實樣貌。 只要你一直拾取各種物品，你記憶便會慢慢回來。 \n\n我弟弟霧尼曾經跟我說過，人們可以用<color=yellow>木材和石頭</color>.做成一把石斧。

Italian: Fai il punto del tuo inventario
Japanese: インベントリーの物を把握せよ

English: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Swedish: Rå malm måste smältas i en <color=yellow>Smältugn</color> innan du kan bruka den i <color=yellow>Smedjan</color>.\n\nFör att bygga en smältugn behöver du <color=yellow>Surtlingshjärtan</color>. Sök dem i mörka platser under jorden.
French: Le minerai brut doit être raffiné dans la <color=yellow>fonderie</color> avant de pouvoir l'utiliser dans la <color=yellow>forge</color>.\n\nPour construire une fonderie, il vous faut des <color=yellow>cœurs de Surtlings</color>. Cherchez-en dans les endroits sombres sous terre.
Italian: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
German: Roherz muss zunächst mithilfe eines <color=yellow>Schmelzofens</color> veredelt werden, bevor es mithilfe einer <color=yellow>Schmiede</color> weiterverarbeitet werden kann.\n\nUm einen Schmelzofen zu errichten, benötigst du <color=yellow>Surtling-Kerne</color>. Diese findest an dunklen Orten unter der Erde.
Spanish: Las menas de minerales en bruto han de refinarse en el <color=yellow>horno de fundición</color> antes de poder usarlas en la <color=yellow>forja</color>.\n\nPara construir uno de estos hornos necesitarás <color=yellow>corazones de surtling</color>. Los encontrarás en lugares oscuros y subterráneos.
Russian: Необработанную руду нужно перерабатывать в <color=yellow>плавильне</color>, прежде чем вы сможете использовать ее в <color=yellow>кузнице</color>.\n\nЧтобы построить плавильню, вам понадобятся <color=yellow>ядра суртлинга</color>. Ищите их в темных местах под землей.
Romanian: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Bulgarian: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Macedonian: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Finnish: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Danish: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Icelandic: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Turkish: Ham madeni <color=yellow>Ocak</color>'ta işlemeden önce <color=yellow>Eritme Fırını</color>'nda rafine etmen gerekiyor.\n\nEritme Fırını inşa etmek için <color=yellow>Alaz Çekirdekleri</color>'ne ihtiyacın olacak. Bulmak için toprağın altındaki karanlık yerleri arayabilirsin.
Lithuanian: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Czech: Před zpracováním surové rudy v <color=yellow>Kovárně</color> je třeba rudu rafinovat v <color=yellow>Huti</color>.\n\nK vybudování Huti budeš potřebovat <color=yellow>Jádra Surtlinga</color>. Hledej je na temných místech pod zemí.
Hungarian: A nyers érc finomítást igényel az <color=yellow>olvasztókemencében</color>, mielőtt feldolgozhatnád a <color=yellow>kohóban</color>.\n\nEgy olvasztókemence megépítéséhez <color=yellow>surtfatty magokra</color> lesz szükséged. Kutasd fel őket a föld mélyének sötét helyein!
Slovak: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Polish: Surową rudę należy uszlachetnić w <color=yellow>odlewni</color>, zanim będzie można ją przerobić w <color=yellow>kuźni</color>.\n\nAby skonstruować odlewnię, będą potrzebne ci <color=yellow>rdzenie surtlinga</color>. Wypatruj ich w ciemnych zakamarkach ukrytych pod ziemią.
Dutch: Ruwe erts moet worden verfijnd in de <color=yellow>smelterij</color> voor je ermee kunt werken in de <color=yellow>smidse</color>.\n\nVoor de bouw van een smelterij heb je <color=yellow>surtlingkernen</color> nodig. Zoek ernaar in de donkere plekken onder de aarde.
Portuguese: Raw ore needs to be refined in the <color=yellow>Smelter</color> before you can work it at the <color=yellow>Forge</color>.\n\nTo build a Smelter you will need <color=yellow>Surtling Cores</color>. Search for them in the dark places beneath the earth.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Minério bruto precisa ser refinado na <color=yellow>fundição</color> antes de ser trabalhado na <color=yellow>forja</color>.\n\nPara construir uma fundição, também é necessário ter <color=yellow>minério de Surtling</color>. Procure por isso em locais escuros no subsolo.
Chinese: 原矿石需要经过 <color=yellow>冶炼炉r</color>的提纯后才可以开始 <color=yellow>锻造</color>。 \n\n你需要 <color=yellow>焰灵之核</color>才可以建造冶炼炉。 去黑暗的地下城搜寻吧。
Japanese: 鉱石の原石はまず<color=yellow>溶解炉</color>で製錬しないと、<color=yellow>鍛冶場</color>で扱えるようにならない。 \n\n溶解炉を作るには、<color=yellow>スルトリングの核</color>が必要だ。 地面の下の暗い場所で探すのだ。
Korean: 가공되지 않은 광석은 <color=yellow>대장간</color>에서 사용되기 전에 <color=yellow>용해로</color>에서 제련해야 한다네. \n\n용광로를 지으려면 <color=yellow>수르트링 코어</color>가 필요하지. 땅 아래의 어두운 장소들을 살펴보게.
Chinese_Traditional: 礦原石需要經過 <color=yellow>冶煉爐</color>的提煉後才可以開始 <color=yellow>鍛造</color>。 \n\n你需要 <color=yellow>焰靈之核</color>才可以建造冶煉爐。 去黑暗的地下城搜尋吧。

English: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Swedish: En präktig näbb på den korpen minsann! Den Svarta Skogen är rik på mineral. Du finner koppar i marken och tenn längs dess kust.\n\nTräd nu fram, och öppna jorden!
French: La Forêt noire regorge de minerais. Vous pouvez trouver du cuivre dans le sol et de l'étain le long de la côte.\n\nPrenez votre pioche pour frapper la terre !
Italian: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
German: Der Dunkle Wald ist äußerst reich an Mineralien: Sein Boden birgt Kupfer und am Strand des Ozeans findest du Zinnvorkommen.\n\nUnd nun geh und beanspruche die Rohstoffe der Erde für deine Zwecke!
Spanish: El Bosque negro es rico en minerales y podrás encontrar cobre en el suelo y estaño en la costa.\n\n¿A qué esperas para ir a picar tierra?
Russian: Черный лес богат минералами, здесь можно найти медь в почве и олово вдоль берегов океана.\n\nА теперь пойдите и встряхните землю!
Romanian: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Bulgarian: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Macedonian: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Finnish: Musta Metsä on mineraalirikas, voit löytää siellä maasta kuparia ja valtameren rannasta tinaa.\n\nMarssi eteenpäin ja iske maata!
Danish: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Icelandic: Svartaskógur er ríkur jarðefna, þar finnur þú kopar í jörðinni og tin við strendurnar\n\nFarðu nú og hakaðu jörðina!
Turkish: Maden açısından zengin olan Kara Orman'da bakır bulabilir ve okyanus kıyısı boyunca sıralı kalaya rastlayabilirsin.\n\nŞimdi git ve maden çalışmalarına başla!
Lithuanian: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Czech: Černý les je bohatý na minerály, najdeš tam měď v zemi a cín lemující pobřeží oceánu.\n\nNyní jdi a vykop zem!
Hungarian: A fekete erdő ásványokban gazdag. Rezet a talajban, ónt pedig az óceán partján lelhetsz fel.\n\nMost pedig menj, és vágj bele a földbe!
Slovak: Black forest is rich in minerals, there you can find copper in the ground and tin lining the ocean shore.\n\nNow go forth and strike the earth!
Polish: W bogatym w minerały Czarnym lesie pod ziemią można znaleźć miedź, a brzegi oceanu wyściełane są pokładami cyny\n\nA teraz idź dalej i zacznij przekopywać ziemię!
Dutch: Het zwarte bos is rijk aan mineralen, en je kunt er koper in de grond vinden en tin langs de kust.\n\nGa eropuit en sla je slag!
Portuguese: A floresta negra é rica em minerais, lá podes encontrar cobre no chão e estanho à beira mar.\n\nAgora segue em frente e bate na terra!
Portuguese_Brazilian: A Floresta Negra é rica em minérios, e lá você pode encontrar cobre no solo e estanho nos litorais.\n\nAgora vá e cave a terra!
Chinese: 黑暗林山有着充足的矿物资源，你可以在内陆上找到铜，在海岸边找到锡。 \n\n现在快去开采吧！
Japanese: 黒い森には多くの鉱物がある。 地面には銅があり、海岸ではスズの連なりがみつかるだろう。 \n\nさあ、行って地面を掘るのだ！
Korean: 검은 숲은 미네랄로 가득하다네, 땅에서는 구리를 찾을수있고 해안가에서는 주석을 찾을수 있지. \n\n이제 가서 세상을 부수게!
Chinese_Traditional: 黑暗森林有著豊富的礦物資源，你可以在內陸上找到銅，在海岸邊找到錫。 \n\n現在快去開採吧！

English: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Swedish: Portaler erbjuder dig snabb färd över Valheims många hörn.\n\nDu måste såklart konstruera en portal på andra änden också. Ge dem samma namn för att koppla dem samman!
French: Les portails sont parfaits pour voyager rapidement entre différentes parties du monde.\n\nVous devez évidemment en construire un de l'autre côté aussi, puis donner aux deux portails le même nom et ils seront automatiquement connectés !
Italian: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
German: Portale eignen sich perfekt, um schnell große der Teile der Welt zu überbrücken.\n\nNatürlich musst du auch dafür sorgen, dass an deinem Ausgangspunkt ein Portal errichtet wurde. Gib dann beiden Portalen dieselbe Kennung, um sie miteinander zu verbinden!
Spanish: Los portales son muy útiles para viajar entre las distintas partes del mundo.\n\nTambién tendrás que construir uno en el sitio al que quieras llegar y, si llamas igual a una pareja de ellos, se conectarán automáticamente.
Russian: Порталы отлично подходят для быстрого перемещения между разными частями мира.\n\nКонечно, сначала вам нужно построить их с обоих сторон, затем дать им одинаковое имя, и они сами заработают!
Romanian: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Bulgarian: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Macedonian: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Finnish: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Danish: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Icelandic: Gáttir eru frábær fyrir hraðferðir á milli mismunandi staði í heiminum.\n\nEn það ætti að vera sjálfsagt að þú þurfir aðra gátt til að taka á móti þér. Þegar þú hefur byggt aðra gátt skaltu gefa henni sama nafnið og þessari, og þá tengjast þær hvor öðru sjálfkrafa!
Turkish: Portallar, dünyanın farklı yerlerine hızlı seyahat etmek için harikadır.\n\nTabii önce gideceğin yere de bir tane inşa etmen ve doğrudan bağlanmalarını sağlamak için ikisine de aynı ismi vermen gerekiyor!
Lithuanian: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Czech: Portály jsou skvělé pro rychlé cestování mezi různými částmi světa.\n\nMusíš postavit portály na obou koncích a dát dvojici stejný název a budou automaticky propojeny!
Hungarian: A portálok kiválóan használhatók a világ különböző pontjai közötti gyors utazásra.\n\nTermészetesen a másik végére is építened kell egyet, majd ugyanazt a nevet adnod mindkettőnek, így automatikusan csatlakoznak egymáshoz.
Slovak: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Polish: Portale pozwalają szybko przemieszczać się do różnych części świata.\n\nOczywiście musisz też zbudować jeden portal na drugim końcu, a następnie nadać parze tę samą nazwę, a wtedy się automatycznie połączą!
Dutch: Portalen zijn geweldig al je snel wilt reizen tussen verschillende plekken in de wereld.\n\nNatuurlijk moet je er op die andere plek ook een bouwen en het paar dezelfde naam geven, dan zijn ze automatisch met elkaar verbonden!
Portuguese: Portals are great for fast travel between different parts of the world.\n\nOf course, you need to build one on the other end as well, then give the pair the same name and they will be automatically connected!
Portuguese_Brazilian: Portais são ótimos para viajar rapidamente entre uma parte do mundo e outra.\n\nClaro, do outro lado também deve haver um portal, basta dar a eles o mesmo nome e estarão automaticamente conectados!
Chinese: 传送门可以使你快速移动到世界的其他位置。 \n\n当然了，你在另一端也必须要有一个传送门才行，你只需要给两个传送门标上同样的名字，这样它们就会自动连接。
Japanese: ポータルがあると、世界のある場所と別の場所との間をすばやく移動できるようになる。 \n\nもちろん、もう一つの場所にも作らなければならない。 そうして両方に同じ名前を付けると、自動的に接続されるのだ！
Korean: 포탈은 세계 곳곳 멀리 떨어져 있는 장소들 사이를 빠르게 이동하는 데에 아주 유용하다네. \n\n물론 반대편에도 포탈을 지어야 하지만 일단 두 포탈에 같은 이름을 부여하면 알아서 연결이 되지.
Chinese_Traditional: 傳送門可以使你快速移動到世界的其他位置。 \n\n當然你在另一端也必須要建立一個傳送門才行，你只需要給兩個傳送門標上同樣的咒文，這樣它們就會自動連接。

Hungarian: Vajon ez egy mezei egér volt...

English: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Swedish: Skogens väsen kommer försöka belägra dig emellanåt. I dessa lägen kanske inte rå vapenstyrka räcker! Bygg ett starkt försvar för att säkerställa din seger mot inkräktarna.
French: Les monstres assiégeront de temps à autre votre camp. La puissance de vos armes ne vous assurera pas toujours la victoire. Établissez une défense solide pour encaisser l'attaque !
Italian: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
German: Von Zeit zu Zeit wird dein Lager das Ziel herumstreunender Monster. Da dir in diesen Fällen starke Waffen nicht den Sieg garantieren, solltest du in Erwägung ziehen, eine starke Verteidigung zu errichten, die mächtig genug ist, um alle Eindringlinge in die Flucht zu schlagen.
Spanish: De vez en cuando, los monstruos asediarán tu campamento. La fuerza de las armas no te garantiza la victoria en estas situaciones, por lo que tendrás que construir una defensa consistente para salir indemne de estas calamidades.
Russian: Время от времени монстры будут вторгаться в ваш лагерь. Мощность оружия не гарантирует вам победу в таких ситуациях. Постройте сильную оборону, чтобы выдержать нашествие!
Romanian: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Bulgarian: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Macedonian: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Finnish: Viholliset piirittävät leiriäsi aika-ajoin. Aseiden voima ei aina takaa sinulle voittoa näissä tilanteissa, joten rakenna myös vahvat puolustukset, että selviydyt tilanteesta voittajana!
Danish: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Icelandic: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Turkish: Yaratıklar bazı zamanlarda kampını kuşatabilirler. Bu gibi durumlardan galip ayrılmanı sağlayacak şey ekipmanının sağlamlığı değil, güçlü savunma yapılarıdır!
Lithuanian: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Czech: Příšery čas od času obléhají tvůj tábor. Síla tvých rukou ti nezaručuje vítězství v těchto situacích, vybuduj silnou obranu, abys předešel bouři!
Hungarian: Időről időre szörnyek veszik majd ostrom alá a táborodat. A fegyverek ereje nem garantálja a győzelmet efféle helyzetekben. Építs erős védelmet, hogy ellenállj a viharnak!
Slovak: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Polish: Potwory będą regularnie dokonywać oblężenia twojego obozu. W takich przypadkach siła broni nie zagwarantuje ci zwycięstwa, dlatego stwórz silną obronę, aby przetrwać szturm!
Dutch: Monsters zullen van tijd tot tijd je kamp belagen. Je vechtkunst alleen kan wellicht niet genoeg zijn om je de overwinning te bezorgen, dus bouw een sterke verdediging op om deze aanvallen te doorstaan.
Portuguese: Monsters will lay siege to your camp from time to time. Strength of arms does not guarantee you victory in these situations, build a strong defence to weather out the storm!
Portuguese_Brazilian: Monstros podem cercar seu acampamento de tempos em tempos, e o poder de ataque não é garantia de vitória em situações assim. Melhor armar uma defesa poderosa e aguentar o tranco!
Chinese: 敌人会时不时的向你的营地发动进攻。 技能或装备并不能保证你一定能赢，你需要修建更坚固的防护才能抵抗他们的进攻。
Japanese: 時々、怪物が野営地を襲うことがある。 このような場合には、自分の腕力で必ず勝てるとは限らない。 嵐を切り抜けるための強い防御を作るのだ！
Korean: 때때로 몬스터들은 그대의 캠프를 공격하기 위해 몰려올 거라네. 개인의 무력이 강하여도 곧장 승리로 이어지지 않을 수 있지, 강력한 수비 건물을 지어 폭풍을 몰아내게!
Chinese_Traditional: 敵人會三不五時的向你的營地發動進攻。 技能或裝備並不能保證你一定能贏，你需要修建更堅固的防護才能抵抗他們的進攻。

German: Du wurdest das Opfer einer Invasion

English: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Swedish: Fyll den här ungen med malm och smält väck dess orenheter, tills blott ren metall kvarstår. Den kan du bearbeta i Smedjan.\n\nEndast <color=yellow>Kol</color> brinner tillräckligt varmt. Bygg en Kolmila och fyll den med trä. Eller bränn mat i mängder.
French: Stockez votre minerai brut dans ce four pour le faire fondre et le débarrasser de ses impuretés, et obtenir un lingot de métal que vous pouvez travailler dans la forge.\n\nIl vous faudra du <color=yellow>charbon</color> pour alimenter la fonderie, que vous pouvez produire en construisant un four un charbon et en le remplissant de bois.
Italian: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
German: Platziere dein Roherz in diesem Hochofen, damit er alle Unreinheiten hinfortschmelzt und du einen Barren veredelten Metalls erhältst, den du für die Schmiede verwenden kannst.\n\nUm den Schmelzofen anzutreiben, benötigst du <color=yellow>Kohle</color>. Kohle wird produziert, indem du einen Kohlenmeiler errichtest und ihn mit Holz füllst.
Spanish: Coloca las menas de mineral en bruto en este horno. Se derretirán todas las impurezas y quedará un lingote de metal refinado que podrás utilizar en la forja.\n\nPara ponerlo en marcha necesitarás <color=yellow>carbón</color>; podrás conseguirlo si construyes un horno de carbón y lo llenas de madera.
Russian: Поместите сюда необработанную руду, чтобы избавиться от примесей и получить кусок очищенного металла для обработки в кузнице.\n\nЧтобы разжечь плавильню, вам понадобится <color=yellow>уголь</color>. Чтобы получить его, постройте печь и заполните ее древесиной.
Romanian: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Bulgarian: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Macedonian: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Finnish: Syötä kaikki raakamalmisi tähän uuniin ja se sulattaa pois kaikki epäpuhtaudet, jättäen jälkeensä harkon käsiteltyä metallia, jota voit työstää Takomossa.\n\nTarvitset<color=yellow>Kivihiiltä</color> Sulatusuunin polttoaineeksi. Tätä voit valmistaa lataamalla Hiiliuunin täyteen puulla.
Danish: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Icelandic: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Turkish: Ham madenlerini bu fırına eklediğinde madenler tüm pürüzlerinden arınır ve Ocak'ta işleyebileceğin rafine külçe elde edersin.\n\nEritme Fırını'nı çalıştırmak için <color=yellow>Kömür</color>'e ihtiyacın olacak ve kömür üretmek için de Kömür Ocağı inşa ederek içine Ahşap atabilirsin.
Lithuanian: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Czech: Vlož svou surovou rudu do této pece a ta roztaví všechny nečistoty a vrátí ti cihlu z rafinovaného kovu kterou můžeš zpracovat v Kovadlině.\n\nK pohánění huti budeš potřebovat <color=yellow>Uhlí</color>, což lze vyrobit postavením pece pro spálením dřeva.
Hungarian: Helyezd el a nyers ércedet ebben az olvasztókemencében, és kiolvasztja belőle az összes szennyeződést, így egy rúd finomított fém dolgozni a kovácsműhelyben.\n\n<color=yellow>Szénre</color> lesz szükséged az olvasztókemence ellátásához. Azt úgy állíthatsz elő, ha építesz egy égetőkemencét, és megpakolod fával.
Slovak: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Polish: Włóż surową rudę do tego pieca, by stopić wszystkie zanieczyszczenia i otrzymać sztabkę rafinowanego metalu do obróbki w kuźni. Do rozpalenia pieca\n\nbędziesz potrzebować <color=yellow>węgla</color>, który można wytworzyć, budując piec i dokładając do niego drewna.
Dutch: Stop je onbewerkte erts in deze oven en het smelt alle onzuiverheden weg, waardoor je een staaf geraffineerd metaal overhoudt om mee te werken in de smidse.\n\nDe smelterij gebruikt <color=yellow>kool</color> als brandstof, wat kan worden geproduceerd door het bouwen van een houtskoolbrander en daar hout in te steken.
Portuguese: Deposit your raw ore in this furnace and it will melt away all impurities, leaving you with a bar of refined metal to work at the Forge.\n\nYou will need <color=yellow>Coal</color> to fuel the Smelter, this can be produced by building a Kiln and loading it with Wood.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Deposite minério bruto nesta fornalha para derreter todas as impurezas até que sobre apenas uma barra de metal refinado, que pode ser trabalhada na forja.\n\nVocê vai precisar de <color=yellow>carvão</color> para abastecer a fundição. Para produzir carvão, construa um forno e encha com madeira.
Chinese: 将你的原矿石放进这台冶炼炉里，它会熔化里面所有的杂质，这样你就能得到纯净的钢材以锻造。 \n\n你会需要<color=yellow>木炭</color>来启动冶炼炉，木炭的生产需要建造一个木炭窑并往里面添上木头。
Japanese: 鉱石の原石をこの炉に入れれば、すべての不純物が溶け出し、あとには精錬された金属の塊だけが残る。 これを鍛冶場で使うことができる。 \n\n溶解炉の燃料として<color=yellow>炭</color>が必要だ。 これは窯を作り、木を入れて作ることができる。
Korean: 가공되지 않은 광석을 이 화로에 넣으면 불순물들이 모두 녹아내려 대장간에서 작업 가능한 막대 형태의 금속 만이 남게 되지. \n\n용광로는 <color=yellow>석탄</color>이라는 연료를 필요로 하는데, 석탄은 가마에 나무를 넣어 만들 거나 음식을 태우면 된다네.
Chinese_Traditional: 將你的礦原石放進這台熔爐裡，它會熔化裡面所有的雜質，這樣你就能得到可用來鍛造的純淨金屬。 \n\n熔煉它們需要用到<color=yellow>木炭</color>，建造一個木炭窯來把木頭燒成木炭。

Spanish: Has construido un horno de fundición

English: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Swedish: Tips: försök att interagera med saker i omgivningen. Vissa objekt som stenar, grenar och bitar av flinta kan samlas in och användas för tillverkning. \n\nFör att öppna skärmen för inventering och tillverkning trycker du på $KEY_Inventory.
French: Conseils : essayez d’interagir avec l’environnement. Certains matériaux, tels que des pierres, des branches et des morceaux de silex peuvent être récupérés et utilisés pour fabriquer des objets.\n\nPour ouvrir votre écran d’inventaire et d’artisanat, appuyez sur $KEY_Inventory.
Italian: Suggerimento iniziale: cerca di interagire con gli oggetti nell'ambiente. Alcuni oggetti come pietre, rami e pezzi di selce possono essere raccolti e utilizzati per la lavorazione.\n\nPer aprire il tuo inventario e la schermata di creazione, premi $KEY_Inventory.
German: Start Tipps: Versuch mit Dingen in der Welt zu interagieren. Manche Objekte, wie Steine, Äste und Feuerstein können gesammelt und fürs Crafting verwendet werden.\n\nDrücke TAB um dein Inventar zu öffnen.
Spanish: Consejos: Intenta interactuar con el entorno. Podrás recoger algunos objetos como las piedras, las ramas o los fragmentos de sílex para elaborar objetos. \n\nPulsa $KEY_Inventory para abrir el inventario y la pantalla de elaboración.
Russian: Совет: с предметами вокруг можно взаимодействовать. Некоторые из них, например, камни, палки и кремень можно собрать и использовать при создании новых предметов. \n\nДля того, чтобы открыть инвентарь, нажмите кнопку $KEY_Inventory.
Romanian: Sfaturi pentru inceput: incearca sa interactionezi cu lucrurile din jurul tau. Unele iteme precum pietre, crengi sau bucati de metal pot fi adunate si folosite in constructii si obiecte.\n\nPentru a deschide inventarul si ecranul de constructie apasa TAB.
Bulgarian: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Macedonian: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Finnish: Aloittelijan vinkkejä: Koeta poimia ja toimia esineiden sekä ympäristösi kanssa. Joitakin esineitä kuten kiviä, oksia ja piikiviä voi poimia ja käyttää käsitöihin.\n\nAvataksesi reppusi ja käsityövalikkosi paina $KEY_Inventory.
Danish: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Icelandic: Byrjunar ábending: Skoðaðu umhvefið vel. Sumir hlutir eins og steinar og greinar er hægt að taka upp og notað í smíði Ýtið á TAB til að fara yfir hluti sem þú átt og hvað þú getur gert við þá
Turkish: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Lithuanian: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Czech: Tipy do začátku: Zkuste interagovat s objekty ve vašem okolí. Některé objekty jako například kameny, větve nebo kousky křemene se dají sebrat a dále použít k výrobě předmětů.\n\nInventář a menu pro výrobu otevřete stisknutím $KEY_Inventory.
Hungarian: Kezdő tippek: próbáld meg használni a környezetben található dolgokat! Néhány tárgy, mint a kövek, ágak és tűzkő darabok felvehetők, és felhasználhatók a barkácsoláshoz.\n \n A leltárad és a barkácsolás képernyő megnyitásához nyomj $KEY_Inventory-t!
Slovak: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Polish: Początkowe rady: próbuj oddziaływać na rzeczy wokół swojego otoczenia. Niektóre przedmioty takie jak kamienie, gałęzie i kawałki krzemieni można podnieść i użyć do tworzenia.\n\nAby otworzyć ekwipunek i okno tworzenia, naciśnij TAB.
Dutch: Start tips: try to interact with things in the environment. Some items like stones, branches and pieces of flint can be collected and used for crafting. \n\nTo open your inventory and crafting screen press $KEY_Inventory.
Portuguese: Dicas iniciais: tenta interagir com coisas no ambiente. Certos objetos, tais como pedras, ramos e pedaços de sílex, podem ser apanhados e usados para fabricar. \n\nPara abrires o teu ecrã de inventário e fabrico, prime $KEY_Inventory.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Dicas iniciais: interaja com os objetos no ambiente. Alguns itens, como pedras, galhos e fragmentos de sílex podem ser coletados e usados para produção. \n\nPara abrir o seu inventário e a tela de produção, pressione $KEY_Inventory.
Chinese: 开始提示：请试着与环境中的各种事物交互。 某些物品，如石头、树枝、燧石块等，可以收集并用于制作。 \n\n要打开物品栏和制作界面，请按$KEY_Inventory。
Japanese: 始まりのヒント：周囲にある様々なものを調べてみよう。 石や枝、火打石のかけらなどは、拾い集めればアイテムの材料として使える。 \n\nインベントリーと作成画面を開くには $KEY_Inventory を押そう。
Korean: 시작 팁: 환경에 있는 사물을 사용해 보세요. 돌, 나뭇가지, 부싯돌 등은 수집 후 제작에 사용할 수 있습니다. \n\n소지품과 제작 화면을 열려면 $KEY_Inventory 키를 누르세요.
Chinese_Traditional: 開始提示：請試著與周圍的事物互動。 例如石頭、樹枝、燧石塊等，可以收集並用於製作。 \n\n要打開背包和製作界面，請按$KEY_Inventory。

Spanish: Te damos la bienvenida a Valheim

English: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Swedish:
Jag är Hugin, hitsänd som din ledsagare under dina resor.

Kring dig står Offerstoderna.
De representerar de Bannlysta: urtida varelser som du måste dräpa för att få tillträde till Valhall.
French: Je suis Hugin, on m'a envoyé ici pour vous guider lors de vos voyages.\n\nLes mégalithes qui vous entourent sont les Pierres sacrificielles. Elles représentent les Déchus que vous devez tuer afin d'accéder au Valhalla.
Italian: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
German: Ich bin Hugin. Und ich wurde an diesen Ort gesendet, um dich zu führen.\n\nDie dich umgebenden Megalithen, sind Opfersteine. Sie repräsentieren all die Wächter, die du bezwingen musst, um dich Walhallas würdig zu erweisen.
Spanish: Soy Hugin, y mi deber es guiarte en tus viajes.\n\nLos megalitos que te rodean son las piedras de sacrificio, y son la representación de los Desterrados. Debes acabar con ellos para ascender al Valhalla.
Russian: Я Хугин, послан сюда, дабы сопровождать вас в ваших путешествиях.\n\nМегалиты, окружающие вас, — это жертвенные камни. Они олицетворяют павших, которых вы должны убить, чтобы попасть в Вальгаллу.
Romanian: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Bulgarian: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Macedonian: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Finnish: Olen Hugin, minut lähetettiin tänne opastamaan sinua matkoillasi.\n\nYmpärilläsi olevat kivipaasit ovat Uhrikiviä. Ne edustavat Unohdettuja, jotka sinun on tapettava noustaksesi Valhallaan.
Danish: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Icelandic: Ég er Huginn, og ég var sendur til að stýra þér í gegnum þennan heim.\n\nÞessir stóru hnullungar í kringum þig eru fórnarsteinarnir. Þeir tákna þeirra yfirgefnu, sem þú þarft að slást við og drepa til að komast inn til Valhallar.
Turkish: Benim adım Hugin ve buraya yolculuğunda rehberlik etmek için gönderildim.\n\nEtrafını çevreleyen anıttaşların ismi Kurban Taşları. Bu taşlar, Valhalla'ya yükselmek için öldürmen gereken Yitikler'i simgeliyorlar.
Lithuanian: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Czech: Já jsem Hugin, byl jsem poslán abych tě vedl na tvých cestách.\n\nMegality, které tě obklopují, jsou Obětní kameny. Představují Ztracené, které musíš zabít, abys jsi mohl vstoupit na Valhallu.
Hungarian: Hugin vagyok, és azért küldtek ide, hogy irányt mutassanak neked az utazásod során.\n\nA körülötted található megalitok az áldozati kövek. Ezek képviselik a cserbenhagyottakat, akiket meg kell ölnöd, hogy felemelkedhess Valhallába.
Slovak: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Polish: Nazywm się Hugin. Wysłano mnie za tobą. Podczas twoich wypraw będę służył ci radą.\n\nOtaczające cię megality to Kamienie Ofiarne. Reprezentują Wygnanych, których musisz zabić, aby dostać się do Walhalli.
Dutch: Ik ben Hugin, en ik zal deze reis je gids zijn.\n\nDe megalieten die je om je heen ziet zijn de Offerstenen. Ze stellen de Verlatenen voor, die je moet verslaan om naar Walhalla te worden verheven.
Portuguese: I am Hugin, sent here to guide you in your travels.\n\nThe megaliths surrounding you are the Sacrificial Stones. They represent the Forsaken, which you must slay in order to ascend to Valhalla.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Eu sou Hugin, fui enviado para lhe guiar em suas jornadas.\n\nOs monumentos megalíticos ao seu redor são pedras de sacrifício, e representam os Guardiões que precisam ser eliminados, se você quiser alcançar o Valhalla.
Chinese:
我是福金，我被派来做你的向导。 

这些包围着你的巨石是献祭石。 
他们代表着被遗忘者们，你必须要按顺序击杀他们以获得升入瓦尔哈拉的机会。
Japanese: 私はフギン。 あなたの旅の案内をするために送り込まれた。 \n\nまわりの巨石は犠牲の石だ。 この見捨てられしものを表している。 ヴァルハラに昇るために殺さなければならない相手だ。
Korean:
나는 후긴이다. 그대의 여정을 안내하기위해 보내졌지. 

주변에 있는 거석들은 희생석이라고 부른다. 
각 희생석은 버려진 자들을 나타내는데, 바로 그대가 발할라에 입성하기 위해 사냥해야 할 존재들이지.
Chinese_Traditional:
我是福金，我被派來做你的嚮導。 

這些包圍著你的巨石是獻祭石。 
他們代表著被遺忘者們，你必須要按順序擊殺他們以獲得進入英靈殿的機會。

Spanish: Te doy la bienvenida al décimo mundo
Dutch: Welkom in de tiende wereld, krijger
Chinese: 欢迎来到第十大神界，勇士
Japanese: 第10世界へようこそ、戦士よ
Korean: 열 번째 세계에 온 것을 환영한다, 전사여
Chinese_Traditional: 歡迎來到第十大神界，勇士

Japanese: フギン：ヴェグヴィシル

English: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Swedish: Dessa magiska stenar spred Oden runtom vidderna för att leda krigare mot de Bannlystas ritualmarker.\n\nTitta noga, och finn vägen till Eikthyrnir, ditt <color=yellow>första offer</color>. Det är en mäktig best, så du gör väl i att beväpna dig innan du ger dig honom an.
French: Ces pierres magiques ont été éparpillées dans le monde par Odin pour servir de repères et mener aux terres rituelles du Déchu.\n\nSi on l'examine avec attention, celle-ci dévoilera le lieu d'invocation d'Eikthyr, votre <color=yellow>première proie</color>. C'est une bête redoutable, alors préparez-vous en conséquence avant d'essayer de le vaincre.
Italian: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
German: Diese magischen Steine wurden durch Odin über die Ländereien verstreut, um als Markierungen für den Ritualboden von Wächtern zu fungieren.\n\nWenn dieser Stein hier genauer untersucht wird, gibt er den Beschwörungsort von Eikthyr preis, deiner <color=yellow>ersten Beute</color>. Da diese Bestie überaus mächtig ist, solltest du dich zunächst entsprechend bewaffnen, bevor du auch nur daran denkst, dich ihr zu stellen.
Spanish: Son piedras mágicas que repartió Odín por estas tierras y que sirven de indicadores para señalar los lugares en los que están las tierras rituales de los Desterrados.\n\nSi la miras con atención, esta te revelará el lugar de invocación de Eikthyr, tu <color=yellow>primera presa</color>. Es una bestia muy poderosa, por lo que tendrás que equiparte en condiciones antes de plantarle cara.
Russian: Один повсюду разбросал эти магические камни в качестве указателей на пути к павшим.\n\nЕсли присмотреться, этот камень откроет место призыва Эйктюра, вашей <color=yellow>первой жертвы</color>. Вам нужно хорошо вооружиться, прежде чем пытаться победить это могучее чудище.
Romanian: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Bulgarian: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Macedonian: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Finnish: Odin sirotteli nämä maagiset kivet ympäriinsä tätä maailmaa toimimaan viittoina, jotka osoittavat kohti Unohdettujen rituaalimaita.\n\nJos tarkastelet tätä kiveä lähemmin, se paljastaa sinulle Eikthyrin, <color=yellow>ensimmäisen saaliisi</color>, kutsumispaikan. Eikthyr on voimakas peto, joten sinun tulee varustautua kelvollisin haarniskoin ja asein jotta kykenet päihittämään hänet.
Danish: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Icelandic: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Turkish: Bu büyülü taşlar, Odin tarafından diyarın dört bir köşesine dağıtılmıştır ve Yitikler'in ayin bölgelerini gösteren tabela görevi görürler.\n\nYakından incelendiğinde bu taş, <color=yellow>ilk avın</color> Eikthyr'in çağrı yerinin konumunu gösterir. Eikthyr güçlü bir yaratık olduğu için onu alt etmeye kalkışmadan önce düzgün şekilde silahlanmalısın.
Lithuanian: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Czech: Tyto magický kameny byly rozptýleny Odinem po krajinách jako ukazatele směřující k rituálům Ztracených.\n\nPokud se podíváš blíže, odhalí ti místo pro vyvolání Eikthyra, tvojí <color=yellow>první oběť</color>. Je to mocné zvíře, takže se musíš pořádně vyzbrojit, než se pokusíš porazit.
Hungarian: Ezeket a mágikus köveket Odin szórta szét a vidéken jelzésként, hogy a cserbenhagyottak rituális területei felé irányítsanak.\n\nHa közelebbről megvizsgálod, ez felfedi az Eikthyr, az <color=yellow>első prédád</color> megidézési helyét. Egy hatalmas fenevad, így megfelelően fel kell fegyverezned magadat, mielőtt egyáltalán megpróbálád legyőzni.
Slovak: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Polish: Te magiczne kamienie zostały rozrzucone po krainach przez Odyna jako drogowskazy wskazujące rytualne tereny Wygnanych.\n\nPrzy bliższym spojrzeniu ujawni on miejsce wezwania Eikthyra, twojej <color=yellow>pierwszej ofiary</color>. To potężna bestia, więc uzbrój się odpowiednio, by móc go pokonać.
Dutch: Deze magische stenen zijn door Odin door het land verspreid om dienst te doen als wegwijzers, die je wijzen naar de rituele grond van de Verlatenen.\n\nBij nadere inspectie zal deze de oproepplek onthullen van Eikthyr, je <color=yellow>eerste prooi</color>. Hij is een machtig beest, dus je zult je goed moeten bewapenen voor je zelfs maar poogt hem te verslaan.
Portuguese: These magical stones were scattered throughout the lands by Odin as signposts pointing toward the ritual grounds of the Forsaken.\n\nIf inspected closer, this one will reveal the summoning place of Eikthyr, your <color=yellow>first prey</color>. He is a mighty beast, so you need to properly arm yourself before even attempting to defeat him.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Essas pedras mágicas foram espalhadas pela terra por Odin como uma forma de indicar os territórios ritualísticos dos Guardiões.\n\nObserve de perto para identificar o local de invocação de Eikthyr, sua <color=yellow>primeira presa</color>. Trata-se de uma fera poderosa, e você vai precisar se armar adequadamente antes de sequer tentar derrotá-lo.
Chinese: 奥丁把这些魔石撒落在了这篇土地上。 作为指南石指引着召唤被遗忘者们的祭坛的前路。 \n\n如果靠近观察，这块指南石会显示召唤赤血灵鹿的位置，你的 <color=yellow>第一个任务</color>。 他是一头无敌的神兽，在尝试击败他之前你必须你必须正式装备好你自己。
Japanese: これらの魔法の石は、見捨てられしものの儀式の場所を示す目印として、オーディンが各地にばらまいたものだ。 \n\nよく見ると、これはエイクスュルを召喚する場所を表していることがわかる。 あなたの<color=yellow>最初の獲物</color>だ。 彼は強い獣だ。 倒そうと思うなら、まず正しく武装する必要がある。
Korean: 이 마법의 돌들은 버려진 자들의 의식장소를 가리키는 의정표로서 오딘께서 지상 곳곳에 흩뿌려 두셨지. \n\n이 돌을 가까이서 살펴보면, 아이크티르, 그대의 <color=yellow>첫번째 사냥감</color>의 소환 장소를 들어낼 것이다. 그는 강력한 야수이니 그를 무찌를 생각을 하기 전에 제대로 무장부터 하는 게 좋을거야.
Chinese_Traditional: 奧丁把這些魔石撒落在了這篇土地上。 作為指南石指引著召喚被遺忘者們的祭壇的前路。 \n\n如果靠近觀察，這塊指南石會顯示召喚赤血靈鹿的位置，你的 <color=yellow>第一個任務</color>。 他是一頭無敵的神獸，在嘗試擊敗他之前你必須你必須正式裝備好你自己。

Swedish: Den här stenen är en Vägvisare
Japanese: この石はヴェグヴィシルだ

Chinese: 福金：赤血灵鹿已被击败
Japanese: フギン：エイクスュルが倒れた
Chinese_Traditional: 福金：赤血靈鹿已被擊敗

English:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Swedish:
Du har blivit välsignad med Eikthyrnirs kraft. Använd den väl.

Den Svarta Skogen hyser ditt nästa mål. Gå dit, bekanta dig med dess mörka inre, och upptäck dess glömda skatter och rikedomar.

Den Uråldrige väntar!
French:
Vous avez obtenu le pouvoir d'Eikthyr, utilisez-le à bon escient.

Votre prochaine cible vit dans la Forêt noire. Allez-y, explorez ces terres et découvrez ses trésors perdus et ses ressources enfouis.

L'Aîné vous attend !
Italian:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
German:
Dir wurde die Kraft von Eikthyr gewährt. Verwende sie, wenn du sie brauchst.

Dein nächstes Ziel befindet sich im Dunklen Wald. Begib dich dorthin, erkunde das Gebiet und birg die dort befindlichen verlorenen Schätze und Rohstoffe.

Der Uralte erwartet dich!
Spanish:
Has recibido el poder de Eikthyr, así que no dudes en usarlo cuando las cosas se pongan feas.

Tu próxima víctima mora en el Bosque negro. Parte hacia allí, explora las tierras y descubre los tesoros y bienes perdidos.

¡El Sabio te espera!
Russian:
Вам дарована сила Эйктюра, используйте ее при необходимости.

Ваша следующая цель обитает в Черном лесу. Идите туда, исследуйте земли, чтобы найти затерянные сокровища и ресурсы.

Древний ждет!
Romanian:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Bulgarian:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Macedonian:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Finnish:
Sinulle on myönnetty Eikthyrin voima, käytä sitä kun tarvitset sitä eniten.

Seuraava kohteesi asuu Mustassa Metsässä. Matkusta sinne, tutki ympäristöäsi ja paljasta Mustan Metsän kadonneita aarteita ja resursseja.

Vanhin odottaa!
Danish:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Icelandic:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Turkish:
Sana Eikthyr'in gücü bahşedildi, ihtiyacın olduğu zaman bu gücü kullan.

Sonraki hedefin, Kara Orman'da yaşıyor. Oraya git, toprakları keşfet ve kayıp hazine ve kaynaklarını ortaya çıkar.

Atabey bekliyor!
Lithuanian:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Czech:
Byla ti udělena moc Eikthyra, používej jí v nouzi.


Tvůj další cíl přebývá v Černém lese. Jdi tam, prozkoumej tuto oblast, a odhal jejich ztracené poklady a zdroje.

Prastarý čeká!
Hungarian:
Megszerezted az Eikthyr erejét, használd a nehéz idők során!

A következő célpontod a Fekete erdőben lakik. Utazz oda, fedezd fel a vidéket, és tárd fel az elveszett kincseiket és nyersanyagaikat!

Vár rád az Ősöreg!
Slovak:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Polish:
Otrzymujesz moc Eikthyra, którą możesz użyć w potrzebie.

Twój następny cel żyje w Czarnym lesie. Udaj się tam, eksploruj ziemie i odkryj ich zagubione skarby i zasoby.

Starzec czeka na ciebie!
Dutch:
Je hebt de kracht van Eikthyr gekregen, gebruik die in tijden van nood.

Je volgende doelwit vind je in het zwarte bos. Ga erheen, verken het gebied en ontdekt de verloren schatten en hulpbronnen.

De Oudere wacht op je!
Portuguese:
You have been granted the power of Eikthyr, use it in times of need.

Your next target dwells in the Black forest. Go there, explore the lands, and uncover their lost treasures and resources.

The Elder awaits!
Portuguese_Brazilian:
Você recebeu o poder de Eikthyr, use-o em momentos de necessidade.

Seu próximo alvo vive na Floresta Negra. Vá até lá, explore o local e encontre tesouros e recursos perdidos.

O Ancião está à espera!
Chinese:
你获得了赤血灵鹿的力量，请在你需要的时候使用。 

你的下一个目标会在黑暗林山里。 去那里探索并发现被遗忘的宝物和资源吧。 

古树长老正在等你！
Japanese:
あなたはエイクスュルの力を授けられた。 必要な時に使うといい。 

次の目標は黒い森にある。 そこに行き、あたりを探索し、失われた宝と資源を見つけるのだ。 

長老が待っている！
Korean:
아이크티르의 힘이 그대에게 전해졌다, 필요한 때에 사용하도록. 

그대의 다음 사냥감은 검은 숲에 살고있다. 그 곳으로 가서 그 땅을 탐험하고 잃어버린 보물과 자원들을 찾아내라. 

장로가 기다릴지니!
Chinese_Traditional:
你獲得了赤血靈鹿的力量，請在你需要的時候使用。 

你的下一個目標會在黑暗林山裡。 去那裡探索並發現被遺忘的寶物和資源吧。 

古樹長老正在等你！

Japanese: オーディンは喜んでいる

English: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Swedish: Om du bär för mycket blir du nedtyngd. Du kommer röra dig långsammare, och finna det svårt att hämta andan.
French: Si vous transportez trop de choses, vous subirez de l'encombrement, ce qui vous ralentira et vous empêchera de récupérer de l'endurance.
Italian: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
German: Wenn du zu viele Gegenstände mit dir führst, wirst du beladen, wodurch du langsamer wirst und an Ausdauer verlierst.
Spanish: Si llevas demasiado equipaje, tendrás una sobrecarga, por lo que te moverás más despacio y no podrás recuperar vigor.
Russian: Если вы возьмете с собой слишком много вещей, вы станете нагруженным, что замедлит вашу работу и снизит восстановление выносливости.
Romanian: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Bulgarian: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Macedonian: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Finnish: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Danish: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Icelandic: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Turkish: Çok fazla eşya taşıdığında aşırı yükten etkilenirsin, hızın yavaşlar ve kondisyonunu geri kazanman engellenir.
Lithuanian: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Czech: Pokud neseš příliš mnoho předmětů tak budeš přetížen a nebudeš si moct regenerovat výdrž.
Hungarian: Ha túl sok holmit cipelsz magaddal, leterheltté válsz, lelassulsz, és megakadályozza, hogy visszanyerd a kitartásodat.
Slovak: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Polish: Zbyt duży ekwipunek obciąża cię, co spowalnia cię i uniemożliwia odzyskanie kondycji.
Dutch: Als je te veel bagage hebt, raak je overbelast, waardoor je langzamer wordt. Ook voorkomt het dat je je conditie weer terugkrijgt.
Portuguese: If you carry too much luggage you will become encumbered, slowing you down and preventing you from regaining your stamina.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Se você carregar muita bagagem, sofrerá com sobrecarga, reduzindo sua velocidade e a sua velocidade de regeneração de vigor.
Chinese: 如果你携带太多的东西你会变得迟缓，这会降低你的移动速度并让你的耐力值无法恢复。
Japanese: 運んでいる荷物が多すぎると重荷となり、歩く速度が遅くなるうえ、スタミナがなかなか回復しなくなる。
Korean: 너무 많은 짐을 짊어지면 부담이 되어, 걷는 속도가 느려지고 스태미나를 회복하지 못하게 된다.
Chinese_Traditional: 如果你攜帶太多的東西你會變得遲緩，這會降低你的移動速度並讓你的耐力值無法恢復。

English: You need to lighten your load!
Italian: You need to lighten your load!
German: Du musst weniger Gegenstände mit dir herumtragen!
Spanish: ¡Tienes que aligerar un poco la carga!
Romanian: You need to lighten your load!
Bulgarian: You need to lighten your load!
Macedonian: You need to lighten your load!
Danish: You need to lighten your load!
Icelandic: You need to lighten your load!
Lithuanian: You need to lighten your load!
Slovak: You need to lighten your load!
Dutch: Je moet niet zo veel willen meenemen!
Portuguese: You need to lighten your load!

English: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Swedish: En av alla ben från den levande gravhögen verkar ha varit ett gaffelben. Ett önskeben, sägs det.\n\nBenet lär innehålla stark magi som leder innehavaren till fördolda ting. Silver, måhända, eller glömda skatter...
French: Apparemment, un des os de cet ossuaire vivant dans son ventre était un bréchet.\n\nCet os contient une magie puissante qui peut vous guider à des choses cachées sous la terre. Il peut détecter les filons d'argent mais peut également vous mener à un trésor enfoui...
Italian: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
German: Wie es aussieht, war einer der vielen Knochen, die sich in diesem Ossuarium befanden, eine Wünschelrute.\n\nDieser Knochen beherbergt eine mächtige Magie, die dich zu Dingen führt, die unter der Erde verborgen liegen. Sie führt dich nicht nur zu Silbervorkommen, sondern auch zu vergrabenen Schätzen …
Spanish: Parece que uno de los muchos huesos que escondía este osario en el estómago era una fúrcula.\n\nEste hueso contiene una magia poderosísima que te guía hacia las cosas que se encuentran ocultas en la tierra. Puede encontrar filones de plata... e incluso tesoros enterrados.
Russian: Похоже, что одной из многих костей, таившихся в это груде, была дужка.\n\nЭта кость содержит мощную магию, которая приведет вас к скрытым в земле вещам. Она может отыскать залежи серебра, а может также привести вас к кладу...
Romanian: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Bulgarian: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Macedonian: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Finnish: Osoittautuu että yksi monesta tämän elion sisällä piilossa olleista luista oli Toivomusluu.\n\nTämä luu sisältää voimakasta magiaa joka ohjaa sinut kohti maan alla piilossa olevia asioita. Se voi paikallistaa Hopeamalmeja, mutta voi johtaa sinut myös haudatun aarteen luo...
Danish: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Icelandic: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Turkish: Görünüşe göre, kemik dolu bu kütlenin midesinde bir de Lades Kemiği varmış.\n\nBu kemik, seni toprağın altında saklı olan şeylere yönlendirecek güçlü bir büyüye sahip. Lades Kemiği, Gümüş maden damarlarını bulabilir ve bazen seni gömülü bir hazineye de yönlendirebilir...
Lithuanian: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Czech: Zdá se, že jednou z mnoha kostí, které tato živá kostra skryla v břiše, byla Wishbone.\n\nTato kost obsahuje mocnou magii, která tě zavede k věcem skrytým v zemi. Může najít stříbrné žíly, ale může tě také vést k zakopanému pokladu...
Hungarian: Úgy tűnik, a sok csont közül, amelyeket ez az élő csontkamra a hasában rejtegetett, egy villacsont volt.\n\nEz a csont hatalmas erejű mágiát tartalmaz, amely elvezet a földben rejlő dolgokhoz. Képes felkutatni az ezüst érctelepeket, de eltemetett kincsekhez is utat mutathat...
Slovak: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Polish: Wygląda na to, że jedną z wielu kości, które ten żywy kościotrup ukrył w swoim brzuchu, była kość pomyślności.\n\nDrzemie w niej potężna magia, która zaprowadzi cię do rzeczy ukrytych pod ziemią. Dzięki niej zlokalizujesz żyły srebra, a może i nawet trafisz na zakopany skarb…
Dutch: Het lijkt erop dat een van de vele beenderen in de buik van dat levende ossuarium een vorkbeen was.\n\nDit been bevat krachtige magie die je kan leiden naar dingen die in de aarde verborgen zitten. Het kan zilveraders ontdekken, maar je ook leiden naar begraven schatten…
Portuguese: It seems one of the many bones this living ossuary hid in his belly was a Wishbone.\n\nThis bone contains powerful magic that guides you to things hidden in the earth. It can locate Silver veins, but may also lead you to buried treasure...
Portuguese_Brazilian: Ao que parece, um dos muitos ossos que este ossuário vivo escondia na barriga era um ossinho da sorte.\n\nEste osso contém magia poderosa que guia você até coisas ocultas sob a terra. Ele pode localizar veios de prata, ou levar você a um tesouro enterrado…
Chinese: 貌似在他腹部藏着的许多骨头里，其中有一块愿望骨。 \n\n这块骨头携带着强大的魔法，可以带你找到许多隐秘的宝物。 它能定位银矿源，也可能带你找到被埋藏的宝藏...
Japanese: この生ける骨壷が腹に隠していた多くの骨の一本は叉骨だったようだ。 \n\nこの骨には強力な魔法がかけられており、地中に隠されたものへと導いてくれる。 銀の鉱脈を探し当てることができるのだが、埋まった宝物が見つかるかもしれない...
Korean: 보아하니 이 걸어 다니는 납골당이 뱃속에 감쳐뒀던 뼈들 중에 위시본이 있었던 모양이야. \n\n이 뼈는 그대를 지상에 숨겨진 것들로 안내해 주는 강력한 마법을 담고 있지. 은 맥을 찾을 수도 있고, 어쩌면 파묻혀있는 보물로 안내해 줄지도 모르지.
Chinese_Traditional: 好像在他腹部藏著的許多骨頭裡，其中有一塊就是願望骨。 \n\n這塊骨頭自帶著強大的魔法，可以帶你找到許多隱秘的寶物。 它能定位銀礦脈，也可能帶你找到被埋藏的寶藏...

English: Bonemass left you a parting gift
French: Masse-d'Os vous a laissé un cadeau !

Romanian: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Bulgarian: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Macedonian: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Danish: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Icelandic: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Turkish: Kütlekemik sana bir veda hediyesi bıraktı
Lithuanian: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Czech: Bonemass ti zanechal dárek na rozloučenou
Slovak: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Dutch: Bottenmassa heeft een geschenk voor je achtergelaten
Portuguese: Bonemass left you a parting gift
Portuguese_Brazilian: Massa Óssea deixou um presente de despedida
Chinese: 邪骨恶灵给你留下了一份礼物
Japanese: 大骨が餞別を残したようだ
Korean: 본매스가 그대를 위해 작별 선물을 남겼군
Chinese_Traditional: 邪骨惡靈給你留下了一份禮物

English: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Swedish: Arbetsbänken låter dig skapa <color=yellow>komplexa ting</color>, och ger dig även tillgång till ytterligare <color=yellow>Byggdelar</color> att bygga med Hammaren.
French: La table de fabrication vous permet de fabriquer des <color=yellow>objets complexes</color> et vous donne aussi accès à bien plus d'<color=yellow>éléments de construction</color> à bâtir avec le marteau.
Italian: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
German: Die Werkbank erlaubt dir die Herstellung <color=yellow>komplexer Gegenstände</color> und gewährt dir Zugriff auf weitere <color=yellow>Gebäudestücke</color>, die du mit dem Hammer herstellen kannst.
Spanish: El banco de trabajo te permite fabricar <color=yellow>objetos complejos</color>, además de darte acceso a muchísimas más <color=yellow>construcciones</color> que podrás erigir con el martillo.
Russian: На верстаке вы сможете создавать <color=yellow>сложные предметы</color>, а также открыть больше <color=yellow>зданий</color>, которые можно построить с помощью молота.
Romanian: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Bulgarian: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Macedonian: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Finnish: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Danish: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Icelandic: Vinnubekkurinn leyfir þér að smíða <color=yellow>flókna hluti</color> jafnt og hann gefur þér aðgang að <color=yellow>byggingar hlutum</color> til að smíða með hamrinum.
Turkish: Tezgâh, <color=yellow>karmaşık Eşyalar</color> yapmana olanak tanır ve Çekiç ile inşa edebileceğin daha çok <color=yellow>Yapı Parçası</color>'na erişmeni sağlar.
Lithuanian: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Czech: Pracovní stůl umožňuje stavět <color=yellow>komplexní věci</color> a také poskytuje přístup k mnoha dalším <color=yellow>stavebním dílům</color>, které můžeš postavit pomocí kladiva.
Hungarian: A munkaasztal lehetővé teszi, hogy <color=yellow>összetett tárgyakat</color> készíts, valamint hozzáférést biztosít rengeteg, a kalapáccsal megépíthető <color=yellow>építőelemhez</color>.
Slovak: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Polish: Stół warsztatowy umożliwia wytwarzanie <color=yellow>przedmiotów</color>, a także daje dostęp do wielu innych <color=yellow>elementów konstrukcyjnych</color>, które można stworzyć za pomocą młota.
Dutch: De werkbank geeft je de mogelijkheid om <color=yellow>complexe items</color> te maken, en geeft je tevens toegang tot veel meer <color=yellow>gebouwstukken</color> die je met de hamer kunt bouwen.
Portuguese: The Workbench allows you to craft <color=yellow>complex Items</color> as well as giving you access to lots of more <color=yellow>Building Pieces</color> to construct with the Hammer.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A bancada permite fabricar <color=yellow>objetos complexos</color>, além de dar acesso a muito mais <color=yellow>peças de construção</color> para usar com o martelo.
Chinese: 工作台是你制作<color=yellow>合成物品</color>的地方，也可以让你有更多的<color=yellow>建材</color>选项。
Japanese: 作業台があると、<color=yellow>複雑な物</color>を作れるようになるだけでなく、ハンマーで建設する時に使う、さまざまな<color=yellow>建築の部品</color>が手に入るようになる。
Korean: 작업대는 좀 더 <color=yellow>복잡한 아이템</color> 을 만드는 것을 가능케 하고 망치로 더 많은 <color=yellow>건축물들</color>을 지을 수 있도록 해주지.
Chinese_Traditional: 工作檯是你<color=yellow>合成物品</color>的地方，也可以讓你有更多的<color=yellow>建材</color>選項。

French: Vous avez construit une table de fabrication
Spanish: Has construido un banco de trabajo
